entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16 except minus 26 near the Saskatchewan border.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16 except minus 26 near the Saskatchewan border. Wind chill minus 24 this evening. Forecast issued 10:19 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 10:19 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 10:19 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
